msquerybuilderbackend.business

Class QueryBuilderBusiness

  • java.lang.Object
    • msquerybuilderbackend.business.QueryBuilderBusiness

  • @Component
public class QueryBuilderBusiness
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for all activities with neo4j database regarding the entity QueryBuilder in the application and QueryBuilderJsonStringObject in the neo4j database
    Author:
    drago

        public org.neo4j.ogm.model.Result executeQueryBuilderQuery(QueryBuilder queryBuilder)
                                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        method which builds the query of a given queryBuilder and executes this query in the neo4j database
        Parameters:
        queryBuilder - is the given queryBuilder the query is built of
        Returns:
        a Result of the executed query
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a value and its given type of the queryBuilder object do not match (through the queryBuilderWriterBusiness)

      • createQueryBuilder

        public java.lang.Long createQueryBuilder(QueryBuilder queryBuilder)
                                  throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException,
                                         java.lang.Exception
        method which checks if the name of the object already exists and returns 0L, otherwise it creates a QueryBuilderJsonStringObject with the given QueryBuilder Objects and also the ExpertQuery for this object, maps them, and saves it in the neo4j database
        Parameters:
        queryBuilder - is the given object which has to be converted to a QueryBuilderJsonStringObject
        Returns:
        the neo4j ID of the created object
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the QueryBuilder Object cannot be parsed into a JSONString
        java.lang.Exception - if a value and its given type of the queryBuilder object do not match (through the queryBuilderWriterBusiness)

      • generateQueryBuilderQueryString

        public ExpertQuery generateQueryBuilderQueryString(QueryBuilder queryBuilder)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        method which generates the queryString of a given QueryBuilder object
        Parameters:
        queryBuilder - is the given object the queryString is built with
        Returns:
        an ExpertQuery Object with the generated queryString and the parameters
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a value and its given type of the queryBuilder object do not match (through the queryBuilderWriterBusiness)

      • deleteQueryBuilder

        public void deleteQueryBuilder(java.lang.String queryId)
        method which deletes a certain QueryBuilderJsonStringObject in the neo4j database and also the mapped ExpertQuery
        Parameters:
        queryId - is the ID of the object to delete; can be the neo4j ID or the unique name

      • updateQueryBuilder

        public QueryBuilderJsonStringObject updateQueryBuilder(java.lang.String queryId,
                                                       QueryBuilder updatedQuery)
                                                throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException,
                                                       java.lang.Exception
        method which updates a certain QueryBuilderJsonStringObject in the neo4j database and also the mapped ExpertQuery object
        Parameters:
        queryId - is the ID of the object to update; can be the neo4j ID or the unique name
        updatedQuery - is the QueryBuilder object with the new content
        Returns:
        the updated QueryBuilderJsonStringObject
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the QueryBuilder object updatedQuery cannot be parsed to a JSONString
        java.lang.Exception - if a value and its given type of the queryBuilder object do not match (through the queryBuilderWriterBusiness)

      • getAllQueryBuilder

        public java.util.Set<QueryBuilder> getAllQueryBuilder()
        method which queries all the QueryBuilderJsonStringObject objects in the neo4j database and converts them to QueryBuilder object for the frontend by parsing the saved JSONstrings as QueryBuilder
        Returns:
        a Set of all queried QueryBuilderJsonStringObjects as QueryBuilder objects

      • getQueryBuilder

        public QueryBuilder getQueryBuilder(java.lang.String queryId)
        method which queries a certain QueryBuilderJsonStringObject object and converts it into a QueryBuilder object for the frontend
        Parameters:
        queryId - is the ID of the certain QueryBuilderJsonStringObject object; can be the neo4j ID or the unique name
        Returns:
        the queried object from the database already converted to a QueryBuilder object

      • getQueryBuilderExecute

        public org.neo4j.ogm.model.Result getQueryBuilderExecute(java.lang.String queryId)
        method which executed the queryString of a certain QueryBuilderJsonStringObject object from the neo4j databases
        Parameters:
        queryId - is the ID of the object; can be the neo4j ID or the unique name
        Returns:
        a Result of the executed query from the neo4j database

      • getQueryBuilderQueryString

        public ExpertQuery getQueryBuilderQueryString(java.lang.String queryId)
        method which queries the ExpertQuery (with the queryString and the parameters) from the neo4j database of a certain QueryBuilderJsonStringObject object
        Parameters:
        queryId - is the id of the object the ExpertQuery object is queried; can be the neo4j ID or the unique name
        Returns:
        an ExpertQueryObject of the certain QuerybuilderJsonStringObject object from the neo4j database

      • getQueryBuilderBySearch

        public java.util.Set<QueryBuilder> getQueryBuilderBySearch(java.lang.String category,
                                                           java.lang.String name,
                                                           java.lang.String description)
        method which queries QueryBuilderJsonStringObject objects from the neo4j database with certain parameters and converts the object to QueryBuilder objects for the frontend
        Parameters:
        category - is the category the queried objects have to be in
        name - is the name or the pattern which the objects have to be named with or have to contain in the name
        description - is the pattern which the objects have to contain in the description
        Returns:
        a Set of the found QueryBuilderJsonStringObject objects already converted to QueryBuilder objects
